body:
TC failure is some add-on bugs that I think are fixed in #936, which is waiting for review.

CircleCI failures are lint issues, which also seem to be add-on related. Did something change in the lint rules on the review branch that could have caused this? Either way, should be an easy fix.

```
/app/client/actions/opt-out-study/index.js
  64:20  error  Unexpected template string expression  no-template-curly-in-string

/app/client/actions/tests/test_opt-out-study.js
  5:31  error  Unexpected use of file extension "js" for "../../tests/utils.js"  import/extensions

✖ 2 problems (2 errors, 0 warnings)
```
